1 var Stacktrace		= Stacktrace	|| require('../../src/stacktrace.js');
  2 var QGetterSetter	= QGetterSetter	|| require('../../src/qgettersetter.js');
  3 
  4 (function(){
  5 	var _global	= typeof(window) === 'undefined' ? global : window;
  6 	
  7 	/**
  8 	 * Same as __LINE__ in C
  9 	*/
 10 	QGetterSetter.defineGetter(_global, '__LINE__', function(){
 11 		var stacktrace	= Stacktrace.parse();
 12 		var stackFrame	= stacktrace[2];
 13 		return stackFrame.line
 14 	});
 15 
 16 	/**
 17 	 * Same as __LINE__ in C
 18 	*/
 19 	QGetterSetter.defineGetter(_global, '__FILE__', function(){
 20 		var stacktrace	= Stacktrace.parse();
 21 		var stackFrame	= stacktrace[2];
 22 		return stackFrame.basename();
 23 	});
 24 
 25 	/**
 26 	 * Same as __FUNCTION__ in C
 27 	*/
 28 	QGetterSetter.defineGetter(_global, '__FUNCTION__', function(){
 29 		var stacktrace	= Stacktrace.parse();
 30 		var stackFrame	= stacktrace[2];
 31 		return stackFrame.fct;
 32 	});
 33 })();
 34
